item.title: feat(data): Adding JSONGrid.com
item.description: https://jsongrid.com - Free tool to Visualize, Edit, Filter complex JSON data into beautiful tabular Grid. Save and Share JSON data over link link.

item.title: feat(media): add imgix - media management and caching
item.description: https://www.imgix.com/ - Image Caching, management and CDN. Free plan includes 1000 origin images, infinite transformations and 100 GB bandwidth

item.title: add blacksmith
item.description: https://www.blacksmith.sh/ - Managed performance runners for GitHub Actions that provides 3,000 free minutes per month, with no credit card needed.

item.title: Merge branch 'master' into patch-2
item.description:
https://genezio.com/ - Serverless function provider that gives 1 million function invocations, 100GB bandwidth, and 10 cron jobs per month.

item.title: Move Mendix to low-code
item.description: https://www.mendix.com/ - Rapid Application Development for Enterprises, unlimited accessible sandbox environments supporting total users, 0.5 GB storage and 1 GB RAM per app. Also, Studio and Studio Pro IDEs are allowed in the free tier.

item.title: Add Lockitbot
item.description: https://www.lockitbot.com/ - Reserve and lock shared resources within Slack like Rooms, Dev environments , servers etc. Free for upto 2 resources
